title: Albania to apply drastic measures to improve tourism
text:
(MENAFN) Albanian government is preparing a policy package to develop the tourism division, according to government officials.

The new measures would also provide businesses that want to invest to improve infrastructure with soft loans, thus addressing the key issue of Albanian tourism.

The government also seeks to attract foreign investors to build resorts and five star hotels in the Albanian Riviera by giving them a wide range of incentives.

Tourism is one of the leading industries in Albania. It creates new jobs throughout the country; therefore the new policy's goal is to considerably boost the tourism sector.
